channel.title: IS it possible!
channel.description: could i make a mix of codes like a server made with java and C++!? if so how thanks =D

item.title: IS it possible!
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:184844”]ontopic: you could use jni, but its slow and completely pointless for a private server

any post quoted below indicates that the poster is a complete fucking idiot and should cease visiting this site

[quote author=bug link=topic=246527.msg2077169#msg2077169 date=1204177974]
you can use multiple programming languages, most likely not all in the same file…but if i am correct, java runs on all systems and C++ is limited to windows.
[/quote][quote author=MasterBacus link=topic=246527.msg2077173#msg2077173 date=1204178026]
well mac is supposed to have problems with servers…
Linux is supposed to also.
[/quote][quote author=andynerd link=topic=246527.msg2077208#msg2077208 date=1204178736]
how about hmm C++ and then a C++ to java converter in your server to make it compatible to everyone (also i have been thinking of this with visual basic or atleast make a client with VB)
[/quote][quote author=alexplt178 link=topic=246527.msg2077268#msg2077268 date=1204180876]
i am also quit firmilirar with visual but i need a positve awnser could or or could i not mabey i would need to get a C++ compiler and java compiler in my folder?
[/quote][/quote]

ROFL that is funny I think if you switched everthing to C++ you would have a hell of a time stick with java makes your life easy

Read full topic
